Compliance OfficerJob at AIMS Education




        
    

        
        AIMS Education is an overseas education consulting firm that helps students to study abroad. Through AIMS Education, overseas intending students can study in the UK, USA, Canada, Australia, Denmark, Hungary, Poland, UAE and Malaysia.. The experienced team of AIMS Education offers authentic and resourceful information and solutions to students interested in studying abroad. The experienced and well-trained counsellors of AIMS Education are dedicated to offering multiple services and help to the students anytime they need it. They have real-life experience studying abroad. Moreover, they get training from the experts to be up-to-date with their knowledge.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Compliance Officer
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Ogudu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full time
Work mode: Onsite

Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
